HERO.TITLE: Your story in every pixel
HERO.DESCRIPTION: Hi, I'm Sonya! I specialize in authentic family photography, joyful children's portraits, and meaningful Bar/Bat Mitzvah celebrations. With a fresh and warm approach, I create timeless images that tell your unique story. Each photo session is tailored to capture genuine emotions and create memories that last a lifetime.
